page.title: 08Children's Games _ Ingleton
page.content: Hide and Seek: When you play hide and seek as many people that want to play can play.One person is the seeker and they have to count to a certain number.It might be a hundred or two hundred.While the person is counting we all go and hide.While you are hiding you have to be very quiet.When you are found then you become the seeker.Any number of people can play at the same time Rounders:Rounders is a very popular game.It is a fast moving game.As many people who want to play can play.You need quite a lot of rounders bats and you need a ball.There are two teams. There is someone balling.The first person who is batting has to try and hit the ball.If they do not hit it they have to run to first base. There are four bases to run to.If you hit the ball you can try to run all round.
